wikipedia_page.main: Philip Milner Oliver CBE (20 August 1884 – 12 April 1954) was a radical British Liberal Party politician in the United Kingdom who served for two short terms as Member of Parliament (MP) for Manchester Blackley.

response: Philip Oliver is the name of:
* Philip Oliver (Irish politician) (c. 1720–1768), MP for Kilmallock
* Philip Oliver, one of the Oliver Twins (born 1969), developer of computer games
